languages.text: {n}Склонившись над умирающим, техножрец решительным, но в то же время исполненным удивительного почтения движением перерезает горло бедняги. За несколько мгновений работы длинным скальпелем он освобождает от плена мышц и сухожилий шейные позвонки, рассекает их и отделяет голову от тела.{/n}

{n}Leaning over the dying man, Pasqal, in a decisive yet surprisingly respectful motion, cuts his throat. Wielding a long scalpel, it takes him mere moments to release the cervical vertebrae from the hold of muscles and sinew and to cut the vertebrae, severing the head from the body.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Склонившись над умирающим, техножрец решительным, но в то же время исполненным удивительного почтения движением перерезает горло бедняги. За несколько мгновений работы длинным скальпелем он освобождает от плена мышц и сухожилий шейные позвонки, рассекает их и отделяет голову от тела.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Leaning over the dying man, Pasqal, in a decisive yet surprisingly respectful motion, cuts his throat. It takes him moments to use a long scalpel to release the cervical vertebrae from the hold of muscles and sinew, cut the vertebrae, and sever the head from the body.{/n}

{n}Leaning over the dying man, Pasqal, in a decisive yet surprisingly respectful motion, cuts his throat. It takes him moments to use a long scalpel to release the cervical vertebrae from the hold of muscles and sinew, cut the vertebrae, and sever the head from the body.{/n}

{n}Leaning over the dying man, Pasqal, in a decisive yet surprisingly respectful motion, cuts his throat. Wielding a long scalpel, it takes him mere moments to release the cervical vertebrae from the hold of muscles and sinew and to cut the vertebrae, severing the head from the body.{/n}

{n}Leaning over the dying man, Pasqal, in a decisive yet surprisingly respectful motion, cuts his throat. Wielding a long scalpel, it takes him mere moments to release the cervical vertebrae from the hold of muscles and sinew and to cut the vertebrae, severing the head from the body.{/n}

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡伏在这个垂死的人身上，以果断而又充满敬意的动作，割断了这个人的喉咙。他手中挥舞着一把长长的手术刀，只用了片刻时间，就将那个人的颈椎从肌肉与筋腱的束缚中解放出来，并切断了他的椎骨，将他的头部与身体分离。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Leaning over the dying man, Pasqal, in a decisive yet surprisingly respectful motion, cuts his throat. Wielding a long scalpel, it takes him mere moments to release the cervical vertebrae from the hold of muscles and sinew and to cut the vertebrae, severing the head from the body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡伏在这个垂死的人身上，以果断而又充满敬意的动作，割断了这个人的喉咙。他手中挥舞着一把长长的手术刀，只用了片刻时间，就将那个人的颈椎从肌肉与筋腱的束缚中解放出来，并切断了他的椎骨，将他的头部与身体分离。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal se inclina sobre el hombre agonizante y le rebana la garganta con un movimiento decidido, aunque sumamente respetuoso. Con un bisturí largo en la mano, le toma unos segundos liberar las vértebras cervicales del agarre de los músculos y los tendones y cortarlas, separando la cabeza de su cuerpo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Leaning over the dying man, Pasqal, in a decisive yet surprisingly respectful motion, cuts his throat. Wielding a long scalpel, it takes him mere moments to release the cervical vertebrae from the hold of muscles and sinew and to cut the vertebrae, severing the head from the body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal se inclina sobre el hombre agonizante y le rebana la garganta con un movimiento decidido, aunque sumamente respetuoso. Con un bisturí largo en la mano, le toma unos segundos liberar las vértebras cervicales del agarre de los músculos y los tendones y cortarlas, separando la cabeza de su cuerpo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルは瀕死の男の上に体を近づけると、迷いなく、しかし驚くほど敬意を払った所作で喉を切り裂いた。長いメスを操り、ほんの一瞬で、筋肉と腱に繋がった頸椎を解き放ち、椎骨を切断して頭部を体から切り離す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Leaning over the dying man, Pasqal, in a decisive yet surprisingly respectful motion, cuts his throat. Wielding a long scalpel, it takes him mere moments to release the cervical vertebrae from the hold of muscles and sinew and to cut the vertebrae, severing the head from the body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは瀕死の男の上に体を近づけると、迷いなく、しかし驚くほど敬意を払った所作で喉を切り裂いた。長いメスを操り、ほんの一瞬で、筋肉と腱に繋がった頸椎を解き放ち、椎骨を切断して頭部を体から切り離す。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal lehnt sich über den Sterbenden und schneidet ihm entschlossen und doch überraschend respektvoll die Kehle durch. Mit einem langen Skalpell löst er in wenigen Sekunden die Halswirbelsäule aus Muskeln und Sehnen, schneidet sie ab und trennt so den Kopf vom Körper.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Leaning over the dying man, Pasqal, in a decisive yet surprisingly respectful motion, cuts his throat. Wielding a long scalpel, it takes him mere moments to release the cervical vertebrae from the hold of muscles and sinew and to cut the vertebrae, severing the head from the body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal lehnt sich über den Sterbenden und schneidet ihm entschlossen und doch überraschend respektvoll die Kehle durch. Mit einem langen Skalpell löst er in wenigen Sekunden die Halswirbelsäule aus Muskeln und Sehnen, schneidet sie ab und trennt so den Kopf vom Körper.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal se penche sur le mourant et lui tranche la gorge d'un geste résolu, mais étonnamment respectueux. Il ne faut que quelques instants à son long scalpel pour dégager les vertèbres cervicales des muscles et des tendons pour séparer sa tête de son corps.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Leaning over the dying man, Pasqal, in a decisive yet surprisingly respectful motion, cuts his throat. Wielding a long scalpel, it takes him mere moments to release the cervical vertebrae from the hold of muscles and sinew and to cut the vertebrae, severing the head from the body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal se penche sur le mourant et lui tranche la gorge d'un geste résolu, mais étonnamment respectueux. Il ne faut que quelques instants à son long scalpel pour dégager les vertèbres cervicales des muscles et des tendons pour séparer sa tête de son corps.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ölmekte olan adamın üzerine eğilen Pasqal, kati ama şaşırtıcı derecede saygılı bir hareketle boğazını kesiyor. Uzun bir neşter kullanarak boyun omurlarını kas ve kirişlerden arındırıp omurgayla bağlantısını kopararak başını vücuttan ayırması, sadece birkaç dakikasını alıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Leaning over the dying man, Pasqal, in a decisive yet surprisingly respectful motion, cuts his throat. Wielding a long scalpel, it takes him mere moments to release the cervical vertebrae from the hold of muscles and sinew and to cut the vertebrae, severing the head from the body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ölmekte olan adamın üzerine eğilen Pasqal, kati ama şaşırtıcı derecede saygılı bir hareketle boğazını kesiyor. Uzun bir neşter kullanarak boyun omurlarını kas ve kirişlerden arındırıp omurgayla bağlantısını keserek başını vücuttan ayırması sadece birkaç dakikasını alıyor.{/n}
